name: Expected Years of Schooling - HDR (2018)
title: Expected Years of Schooling - HDR (2018)
description: Number of years of schooling that a child of school entrance age can expect to receive if prevailing patterns of age-specific enrollment rates persist throughout the child’s life.

sources.name: Expected Years of Schooling - HDR (2018)
sources.additionalInfo: Number of years of schooling that a child of school entrance age can expect to receive if prevailing patterns of age-specific enrollment rates persist throughout the child’s life.
